title: Impudent Crimes
description: An erotic novel set in the 1980's with bdsm, f/f, female submission themes by Bertram Fox.Party girl Celia wakes up to find a slave collar on her neck and a whole new adventure beginning. The Workshop – Peter the Master, Gabriel the leather dyke, Juno the dominatrix and Jason the sexpert – mean to use their new toy in every way they can. But the Workshop has dangerous enemies, and Celia's adventures get extremely painful before she can rest in the love of her cruel Master.
author: Bertram Fox
